name: Air
description: That amazing feeling of defying gravity! That, my friend, is something only we feel.

name: Dark
description: Sometimes, shadows are the best places to hide the greatest strengths.

name: Earth
description: May the strength of earth, steel and iron be with us! We're tough as rocks!

name: Fire
description: You don't know 'hot' until you've met these guys.

name: Life
description: Life - what a mighty, humbling and beautiful thing it is.

name: Light
description: Even the faintest flicker of light brings out hope.

name: Magic
description: Abracadabra! Hey there! Wanna see some magic tricks?

name: Tech
description: Need a little fixin' up? We've got all the right tools.

name: Undead
description: Do you like scary stories? Wanna hear ours?

name: Water
description: Wash away your fears, and relax by the pool with us.
